details:
It was discovered that there was a user-after-free vulnerability in irssi,
the popular terminal-based IRC client.


* [CVE-2019-13045](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2019-13045)
Irssi before 1.0.8, 1.1.x before 1.1.3, and 1.2.x before 1.2.1, when
 SASL is enabled, has a use after free when sending SASL login to the
 server.


For Debian 9 Stretch, these problems have been fixed in version
1.0.7-1~deb9u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your irssi packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
